Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the bond issuance charge
Summary: Relates to the bond issuance charge as applied to the New York city housing development corporation.
LawCode: Amd ยง2976, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the bond issuance charge
